name: Pocket Pet Collect Battle
description:
A cool RPG game with pet battle system and vertical scrolling map.

Choose your pocket pet and battle against other pet owners in your mission to become the best. Capture and collect other monsters in Game!

Train your pets and make them stronger and more versatile. Learn new skills and create an elite team of unbeatable monsters.

The game has dozens of monsters to encounter and collect, various skills to learn, and dozens of trainers to beat. Can you become the champion?

Enjoy it.
